payment.title: Payment Information
payment.accountUpdateWarning: The transfer account changes each time. Please use the latest account for every transaction.
payment.doNotChangeAmount: Please do not change the amount

error.waitForRetry: Please wait {0} seconds to fetch the order from merchant again

result.paymentSuccessDesc: Your payment has been processed successfully. Thank you for your transaction.
result.paymentTimeoutDesc: Your payment has timed out. Please try again or contact customer support.
result.paymentFailedDesc: We couldn't process your payment. Please check your information and try again.
result.paymentProcessingDesc: Your payment is being processed. Please wait a moment.
